languages.text: Спустя годы преданной службы Главному кормчему Равору была дарована — пусть сам он и протестовал против этого — привилегия отдыха. Мудрые служители Омниссии внедрили в его мозг аугмент, вернувший возможность отходить ко сну. Вскоре после этого на корабле произошло вопиющее событие — Главный кормчий проспал начало вахты. Но характер его с той поры стал значительно приятнее.

After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.
languages.original_text: Спустя годы преданной службы Главному кормчему Равору была дарована — пусть сам он и протестовал против этого — привилегия отдыха. Мудрые служители Омниссии внедрили в его мозг аугмент, вернувший возможность отходить ко сну. Вскоре после этого на корабле произошло вопиющее событие — Главный кормчий проспал начало вахты. Но характер его с той поры стал значительно приятнее.

traits.locale_text: After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — a privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that returned him the ability to sleep. Soon after this, an outrageous event happened: Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his shift. Though his temper became much more agreeable.

Soon after this, an outrageous event happened: Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his shift. Though his temper became much more agreeable.

The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that returned him the ability to sleep. Soon afterwards, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that returned him the ability to sleep. Soon afterwards, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

languages.text: 经过多年的无私服务之后，舵手长雷沃被赐予了休息的特权——尽管他本人相当反对。欧姆尼塞亚的聪敏仆人给他的大脑安装了某种植入物，让他恢复了睡眠的能力。不久之后，船上发生了前所未有的事情：舵手长睡过头了，错过了他的上班时间。不过，从那以后，他的脾气变得随和多了。
languages.original_text: After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

traits.locale_text: 经过多年的无私服务之后，舵手长雷沃被赐予了休息的特权——尽管他本人相当反对。欧姆尼塞亚的聪敏仆人给他的大脑安装了某种植入物，让他恢复了睡眠的能力。不久之后，船上发生了前所未有的事情：舵手长睡过头了，错过了他的上班时间。不过，从那以后，他的脾气变得随和多了。

languages.text: Nach jahrelangem treuen Dienst erhielt Hauptsteuermann Ravor — trotz seiner Proteste — das Privileg, ausruhen zu dürfen. Die weisen Diener des Omnissiah implantierten eine Augmentation in sein Gehirn, die ihm die Fähigkeit zu schlafen zurückgab. Bald darauf geschah an Bord des Schiffs etwas, was es noch nie gegeben hatte: Der Hauptsteuermann verschlief und verpasste den Beginn seiner Wache. Sein Naturell wurde von da an aber deutlich erträglicher.
languages.original_text: After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

traits.locale_text: Nach jahrelangem treuen Dienst erhielt Hauptsteuermann Ravor — trotz seiner Proteste — das Privileg, ausruhen zu dürfen. Die weisen Diener des Omnissiah implantierten eine Augmentation in sein Gehirn, die ihm die Fähigkeit zu schlafen zurückgab. Bald darauf geschah an Bord des Schiffs etwas, was es noch nie gegeben hatte: Der Hauptsteuermann verschlief und verpasste den Beginn seiner Wache. Sein Naturell wurde von da an aber deutlich erträglicher.

languages.text: Après des années de bons et loyaux services, le maître timonier Ravor se vit accorder – à son corps défendant – le privilège de pouvoir prendre du repos. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie implantèrent alors dans son cerveau une augmentation qui lui rendit la capacité de dormir. Peu après, un événement sans précédent se produisit à bord du vaisseau : le maître timonier ne se réveilla pas à l'heure et arriva en retard pour sa prise de quart. Cependant, son humeur devint bien plus amène à partir de ce jour.
languages.original_text: After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

traits.locale_text: Après des années de bons et loyaux services, le maître timonier Ravor se vit accorder – à son corps défendant – le privilège de pouvoir prendre du repos. Les serviteurs de l'Omnimessie implantèrent alors dans son cerveau une augmentation qui lui rendit la capacité de dormir. Peu après, un événement sans précédent se produisit à bord du vaisseau : le maître timonier ne se réveilla pas à l'heure et arriva en retard pour sa prise de quart. Cependant, son humeur devint bien plus amène à partir de ce jour.

languages.text: Después de años de leal servicio, el maestro timonel Ravor recibió el privilegio del descanso, a pesar de sus protestas. Los sabios sirvientes del Omnissiah implantaron un aumento en su cerebro que le devolvió la capacidad de dormir. Poco después, ocurrió algo sin precedentes en la nave: el maestro timonel se quedó dormido y llegó tarde a su guardia. Desde entonces, su temperamento mejoró mucho.
languages.original_text: After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

traits.locale_text: Después de años de leal servicio, el maestro timonel Ravor recibió el privilegio del descanso, a pesar de sus protestas. Los sabios sirvientes del Omnissiah implantaron un aumento en su cerebro que le devolvió la capacidad de dormir. Poco después, ocurrió algo sin precedentes en la nave: el maestro timonel se quedó dormido y llegó tarde a su guardia. Desde entonces, su temperamento mejoró mucho.

languages.text: 何年も忠義を尽くしてきたマスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアは、当人の反対をよそに、休息の恩恵にあずかることとなった。賢明なる万機神の従者は脳にオーグメントを植え込むことで眠る能力を取り戻した。ほどなくして、船内では前代未聞の事態が発生する。かのマスター・ヘルムスマンが寝過ごして監視の刻限に遅れたのだ。もっともそれ以降、ラヴォアの気性は格段に穏やかになった。
languages.original_text: After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

traits.locale_text: 何年も忠義を尽くしてきたマスター・ヘルムスマン・ラヴォアは、当人の反対をよそに、休息の恩恵にあずかることとなった。賢明なる万機神の従者は脳にオーグメントを植え込むことで眠る能力を取り戻した。ほどなくして、船内では前代未聞の事態が発生する。かのマスター・ヘルムスマンが寝過ごして監視の刻限に遅れたのだ。もっともそれ以降、ラヴォアの気性は格段に穏やかになった。

languages.text: Yıllarca kendini hizmetine adadıktan sonra Başserdümen Ravor'a, tüm itirazlarına rağmen artık dinlenme hakkı tanındı. Hermesih'in bilge hizmetkârları, beynine bir ogment takarak uyuma kabiliyetini ona geri kazandırdı. Çok geçmeden gemide daha önce görülmemiş bir şey oldu: Başserdümen uyuyakalıp mesaisinin başını kaçırdı. Bu yeni düzene geçtikten sonra çok daha sakin ve makul birine dönüştü.
languages.original_text: After years of dedicated service, Master Helmsman Ravor was granted — despite his objections — the privilege of rest. The wise servants of the Omnissiah implanted an augment into his brain that restored his ability to sleep. Soon afterward, something unprecedented happened aboard the ship: the Master Helmsman overslept and missed the start of his watch. But his temper did become much more agreeable from then on.

traits.locale_text: Yıllar boyunca kendini verdiği hizmetlere adadıktan sonra Başserdümen Ravor'a, itirazlarına rağmen artık dinlenme hakkı tanındı. Hermesih'in bilge hizmetkârları beynine bir ogment takarak uyuma kabiliyetini ona geri kazandırdılar. Çok geçmeden gemide daha önce görülmemiş bir şey meydana geldi: Başserdümen uyuyakaldı ve mesaisinin başlangıcını kaçırdı. Bu yeni düzene geçtikten sonra çok daha sakin ve makul biri hâline geldi.
